title: FREDRICH CARR PENICK
maintext: FREDRICH CARR PENICK, 75, of Wurtland, Ky., husband of Patricia Penick, died Nov. 16 at Cabell Huntington Hospital. He was retired from AK Steel. Funeral service will be 1 p.m. Monday at Steen Funeral Home 13th Street Chapel; burial at Bellefonte Memorial Gardens. Visitation will be one hour prior to the service. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to Fairview Baptist Building Fund. www.steenfuneralhome.com.
